Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Player
  • public class Player
extends Entity
    Player is an entity which represents a IRL player

    Player is characterized by :

    • A matrix of choice
    • A table of combination
    • A size of combination
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Geoffrey
    See Also:
    Entity
